website_summaries.verdict: Experience flexible comfort and sporty casual style with the Skechers Delson Brewton. With a slip-on construction, it has a knit mesh fabric upper that provides both comfort and style perfect for casual and smart outfits. Also, it is equipped with Air Cooled Memory Foam insole for all-day cushioning and comfort.
pros: The Skechers Delson Brewton has a slip-on style with an attractive design that is appreciated by a lot of reviewers
A significant number of respondents have testified that this type of Skechers sneakers offers comfort on feet even for several hours
Many users have testified that this shoe with a knit mesh upper provides foot breathability
The Skechers Delson Brewton is a lightweight shoe, according to some testers
Several purchasers say that it is a durable shoe
Most of the reviewers have mentioned that they would recommend the Skechers Delson Brewton to others
cons: A couple of users have mentioned that the Skechers Delson Brewton has poor cushioning
It does not provide any support, one has complained

customer_reviews.title: Another Skechers Triumph
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing some ten pairs of Delson models, this one appears to be the best. Suffering from bilateral plantar fasciitis, I found the foam technology relieving. Because I dislike most slip-ons and dislike lacing, the flexibility beneath the tongue is snug. I recommend one purchase a shoe horn to prevent repeatedly bending the backstop. All my Skechers may run slightly large, but not a problem. If forced to find any fault with Delton- Brewton sneakers, I'd say heel wear. Walking some 8/mi/day, the heel seems to wear down more than other brands.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas V. Inman

customer_reviews.title: Light weight but difficult to slip on
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a light weight walking shoe for my European trip, but I struggled to get these on my feet because of the lace area. It's very tight. I tried to loosen the laces, but could not without cutting them which I did not do. I wish the manufacturer would let me know how to get these on my feet without struggling to slip my feet past the lace area. Complete waste of money if I can't take them on my trip.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Another GOOD pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a comfortable pair of shoes that I can wear with any outfit and be confident about the quality and style brought me to these shoes. And I have to say that I made the right decision about them. .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: inter support cuts through inside if shoe
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I returned as the back support (plastic piece) cut through the interior material and would rub on my foot. I received a replacement and after a month the back heal piece (plastic piece) is cutting into the heal of my foot. Customer service said the return period has expired, even though the return period was for the original order, not the replacement order. I love the Skecher brand, I even have their golf shoes. Obvious this style has issues, and so does the process to return a defective shoe, even if it happened to be the second par.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Wonder

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Had a few pairs of these that had worn out. Very comfortable and convenient not having to tie.
customer_reviews.author: cadams

customer_reviews.title: 1 of 2 were defective
customer_reviews.text: Yes you heard me right. My right shoe was glued onto the sole crooked. The left shoe fit fine. Yeah keep making these in China/PRC and this is the quality you will get!! This is not the first time I had issues with your product. I have been a Sketcher customer for 30 years. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo "Mark"

customer_reviews.title: Great slip on shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I needed to have surgery and knew I wasn’t going to be able to bend for awhile. I bought these and they fit the bill perfectly. They’re comfortable, easy to put on and unless you state at them don’t realize they’re slip ons.
customer_reviews.author: TrdGuy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific shoe both to wear and to look at. Unfortunately we neded a 9 or an 8.5 W, neither of which is available.
customer_reviews.author: mygolly

customer_reviews.title: Great looking skechers
customer_reviews.text: I've been a die hard fan of sketchers and I've always had a soft spot for them. These shoes fit great but the ankle space was a bit tight and almost ripped them when I tried them on. Overall they eventually 'stretched' out and I take good care putting them on
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Chiera

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel of these slip ons
customer_reviews.text: Best feeling tennis shoes, and love the slip on style that feel secure like laces. Only complaint is I wish the soles lasted longer, seems I wear mine down in a couple months. That said, they feels so good, I bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: GatorMan

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: bought these for my dad who is 86 and wanted something he didn't have to tie... these are perfect look, perfect fit and should hold up very well!
customer_reviews.author: Pati Steve Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought first pair of these shoes for trip to Hong Kong in July 2019. Really liked the shoes. Soles wore out after about 6 months of use. Bought second pair without reservations.
customer_reviews.author: E. Torbert

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, wish they made them in wide
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes! As with all my sketchers, they are really comfortable. They do tend to run a little narrow just above the arch. A wide fit would remedy this.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ezell

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles on  top of toe threw 2 pair in trash. Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Material around top of toe wrinkles and creases after only very little wear.
customer_reviews.author: sideview

customer_reviews.title: PA
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, stylish,and enjoyable. Attempted to reorder as gift for brother and price escalated by 50%. They are good, but not that distinguished. $40 - $60.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, soft step, good looking shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe. Slip on was tight at first but works fine after a few days of breaking. Especially like the light weight and memory foam insert! Very comfortable even after a long on-my-feet day.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L. Oglesby

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son loves fact that there are no shoelaces to tie. Comfy shoes.
customer_reviews.author: B. N.

customer_reviews.title: All 4
customer_reviews.text: Needed a size 15 shoe, comfortable, affordable, and stylish. I came up on these shoes and I'm VERY happy sketchers hit on all 4!!
customer_reviews.author: curtis dickerson sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This product is well made and is a perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Weeks

customer_reviews.title: The shoes fit perfectly, they are just too hard to get on my feet.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes feel great once I get them on my feet, and I really like them. The problem is they are extremely difficult to get them on my feet.The opening for my foot is not big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene Hart

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the mon
customer_reviews.text: For myself, very comfortable and Lightweight.Love them and wear them all the time..
customer_reviews.author: frederick

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes it well, fits him right and it's good quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Died too soon
customer_reviews.text: Heal wore out on the inside quickly leaving plastic edging exposed and cut into my heal
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great casual shoes.
customer_reviews.text: Upon inspection of the shoe noticed that it was very well made and the comfort was great. It matches with any pair of jeans which is what I was looking for. Very comfortable on the feet. Would definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaiian

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: Bought shoe not realizing it is a slip-on. Even if a slip-on is desired style, nightmare to get on! Threw away in first couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Terri L. Hoes

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: Runs narrow and hard to put your foot in the shoe. Wish they had a wide fit and a larger entry into the shoe. Nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Rene

product_meta.title: Skechers mens 65509 Delson- Brewton
product_meta.description: Increase your sporty casual style and flexible comfort levels with the SKECHERS Delson - Brewton shoe. Skech Knit Mesh fabric and synthetic upper in a slip on bungee laced sporty casual comfort sneaker oxford with interwoven designs. Air Cooled Memory Foam insole, flexible comfort midsole.
